About.Hours & facilities: Open by arrangement. Reference assistance available in person.

About.Acquisition focus: History of the Sisters of Mercy, Parramatta.

About.Major holdings: Congregation of the Sisters of Mercy, Parramatta: Letters, manuscripts, official records of entry etc. 1988-1980 (8m). Letters of Cardinal Moran to Sisters of Mercy in Callan (Ireland) and Parramatta: 1874-1911 (0.2m).
